Description: Pale greenish blown glass bowl and cover; cover concave above, plain cut, Not ground smooth; two wheel-incisions at carination; no design on cover.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Curator's comments: For a comparable shape from shape from Cyprus (now in the Hermitage), see Kunina 1997, no. 182. Bibliography: Kunina M. 1997, Ancient glass in the Hermitage collection (Leningrad), 1997).
